title: Do you think the final presidential debate on Thursday could save Trump? - Quora
tags: Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Hunter was the middle man taking millions in bribes in China, Ukraine, Russia, Kazakhstan, and Romania, so far. He used VP Joe Biden’s influence to make illegal deals, and then was forced to give his dad a cut of the money. Or in other words, Joe Biden as the Vice President of the United States used his family members to funnel money into their bank accounts, at the cost of the security of US foreign policy. Joe Biden is now ineligible to be president, because he is vulnerable to international blackmail and extortion. We have pictures and videos of Hunter Biden, engaged in drug use and prostitution. We have financial documents, text messages, and verified emails from his business partner, who is already in Federal jail on corruption charges. The media knows this is all true, and continues to censor people and cover up the story, and refuse to report it. The entire Democrat party is corrupt, and Pelosi and Romney’s kids are also involved in Ukraine energy company. They knew the Russia collusion and Russia dossier was faked, but they pushed that lie to the American people for 3.5 years, and then they tried to impeach Trump for asking about the Ukraine corruption which Joe Biden actually admitted extorting the Ukrainian prosecutor to on tape, bragging about it. It’s all going to come out. Upvote if you want the truth to come out. The hard drives became the legal property of the computer store after Hunter refused to pick them up or pay for them after months of phone calls. The computer store owner offered the hard drives to the FBI and was turned down TWICE. The third time they finally took them, but not before the owner copied the drives and gave them to Rudy Giuliani, the former Mayor of NYC and former federal prosecutor who helped take down several NY mafia families. Rudy then gave the data to a few select news outlets. Rudy recently met with the Delaware state police and gave them the hard drives. Nothing can stop the truth from coming out.

I don’t. The debates don’t really make or break a candidate. Hillary Clinton was considered to have won all of the debates against Trump and still it was so close. Also this election is different anyway. There were some news reports yesterday that so many people have already voted. There aren’t as many undecided voters for Trump to convince. The window is closing for him. I’m also not sure if the debate will happen. Trumps campaign is already complaining about the debate topics and the moderator.

In my opinion Trump doesn’t need saving, we see his support and popularity even in the extreme left states, such as: California and Oregon. But to answer your question, if Trump allows Biden to speak and answer questions, we will be able to see the lack of knowledge on topics such as health care, immigration, etc….#Trump2020

I think the debate will be fine. There are lots and lots of silent Trump supporters. There is a reason why in our daily lives we remain silent and refuse to answer any calls for polling. In fact, in all my voting life, I have never received a call asking me who I was voting for. But Americans want to hear ‘substance’..not personal attacks, and blame…especially for the COVID deaths. So, let’s sit back, eat popcorn and enjoy the show.

It could, all things under the sun are in the range of possible. But recently, every time tRUMP has exposed himself to scrutiny---which means anywhere aside from rallies or sound-bites--- his exposure has worsened his situation & standing. So it's probably a not on debate saving tRUMP.

Thursday will definitely save Trump. Just imagine: he’ll have a whole two minutes of uninterrupted time for each segment to talk about flushing toilets. We know how important that is, so it’s a winner!
NO. I fully expect this debate to go exactly like the first one. Twinkie trying to talk over the Biden and the moderator. Being a typical bully.
It would be better for trump if he never showed up. Him fleeing about now sounds like his best option. Who would want to be in a New York State Prison after being President anyways?
Nothing will save him . He has dug a hole so deep with his lies he will never see the light of day. He is a lost soul.
No! He’ll just act the way he did during the first debate! Showing how inadequate and how mentally unfit he is! He really just needs to sit down and shut up instead of proving his mental instability!
i would think that over 95% of the population has already decided on who they will vote for and remember that only about one half of the population will vote anyway.
